name: Hungry Animals (itch) (Amani Walker)
description:
Aim to get the highest score by feeding the very hungry animals that approach you but be careful not to let them get passed you or you will lose a point. 

If an animal hits you, then your health will decrease and if it hits zero, then you will have to start again.

CONTROLS

A/D = LEFT AND RIGHT

SPACEBAR = THROW FOOD
